ing: 1/2 cup fat-free creamy salad dressing (ie: Fat Free Miracle Whip TM)
des: "I make this dressing, and have it on hand in the fridge to use on any vegetable salad.  Recipe is easily doubled."
ins: In a small bowl, whisk together salad dressing, milk, white sugar, vinegar, and poppy seeds. Chill until ready to use.
